description: This table contains cross-organization referral information.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track the status of a cross-organization referral.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Accepted


Declined


Cancellation Requested


Specialist Visit Completed


Referral Completed


Canceled

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: Store the organization for a cross-organization referral.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_UNIQUE_IDENT
columns.description: Store the unique ID of a cross-organization referral.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_ASGN_AUTH_OID
columns.description: Store the assigning authority OID of a cross-organization referral.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_RSN_CNCL_RQST
columns.description: The reason a cancellation was requested for this referral.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_INST_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the cross-organization status was last updated.

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_INACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this line of cross organization referral information is inactive due to patient unlinking. 'Y' indicates that the information is not currently active. 'N' or NULL indicates that the information is active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CROSS_ORG_RFL_REASON_DECLINE
columns.description: The reason the cross-organization referral was declined.
